subsections.title: Vendor Management
subsections.summary: They coordinate and manage relationships with external IT vendors or service providers. This includes negotiating contracts, evaluating vendor performance, and ensuring timely delivery of services or products.

subsections.title: System Upgrades and Maintenance
subsections.summary: They plan and coordinate system upgrades, software patches, and maintenance activities. This involves scheduling downtime, communicating with users about disruptions, and ensuring minimal impact on operations.
